title: Shapeshifting
data:
***Version [0.31](/0.31 "0.31")**: This article **may not be** up to date for the [latest stable release](/0.32 "0.32") of Crawl.*

The **Shapeshifting** skill governs use of [talismans](/Talisman "Talisman"), items that change your [form](/Form "Form"). Higher Shapeshifting will reduce HP penalties and increase form bonuses.

## Contents

- [1 Aptitudes](#Aptitudes)
- [2 Strategy](#Strategy)
- [3 See Also](#See_Also)
- [4 History](#History)

## Aptitudes

|                                |                              |                            |                                |                              |                                    |                            |                                  |                          |                                |                                |                          |                          |                          |                            |                              |                                |                                            |                          |                        |                                |                      |                                |                          |                          |                              |                                        |
| ------------------------------ | ---------------------------- | -------------------------- | ------------------------------ | ---------------------------- | ---------------------------------- | -------------------------- | -------------------------------- | ------------------------ | ------------------------------ | ------------------------------ | ------------------------ | ------------------------ | ------------------------ | -------------------------- | ---------------------------- | ------------------------------ | ------------------------------------------ | ------------------------ | ---------------------- | ------------------------------ | -------------------- | ------------------------------ | ------------------------ | ------------------------ | ---------------------------- | -------------------------------------- |
| **[At](/Armataur "Armataur")** | **[Ba](/Barachi "Barachi")** | **[Co](/Coglin "Coglin")** | **[DE](/Deep_Elf "Deep Elf")** | **[Dg](/Demigod "Demigod")** | **[Ds](/Demonspawn "Demonspawn")** | **[Dj](/Djinni "Djinni")** | **[Dr](/Draconian "Draconian")** | **[Fe](/Felid "Felid")** | **[Fo](/Formicid "Formicid")** | **[Gr](/Gargoyle "Gargoyle")** | **[Gh](/Ghoul "Ghoul")** | **[Gn](/Gnoll "Gnoll")** | **[Hu](/Human "Human")** | **[Ko](/Kobold "Kobold")** | **[Mf](/Merfolk "Merfolk")** | **[Mi](/Minotaur "Minotaur")** | **[MD](/Mountain_Dwarf "Mountain Dwarf")** | **[Mu](/Mummy "Mummy")** | **[Na](/Naga "Naga")** | **[Op](/Octopode "Octopode")** | **[On](/Oni "Oni")** | **[Sp](/Spriggan "Spriggan")** | **[Te](/Tengu "Tengu")** | **[Tr](/Troll "Troll")** | **[Vp](/Vampire "Vampire")** | **[VS](/Vine_Stalker "Vine Stalker")** |
| -2                             | 0                            | -2                         | 0                              | -2                           | -2                                 | -2                         | -1                               | -2                       | 0                              | -3                             | N/A                      | 7                        | -1                       | -1                         | 2                            | -3                             | -2                                         | N/A                      | -1                     | -1                             | -1                   | 2                              | -2                       | -1                       | 0                            | -1                                     |

## Strategy

- Most forms boost [Unarmed Combat](/Unarmed_Combat "Unarmed Combat") in some way.
- The biggest jump is going from "not being in a form" to "being in a form". If you plan on going Shapeshifting, it can be wise to train Shapeshifting skill exclusively, until you reach an acceptable skill for a given form.
- With the "average" species, [Human](/Human "Human"), having -1 Shapeshifting, don't be afraid to train a negative Shapeshifting aptitude.

## See Also

- [Talisman](/Talisman "Talisman")
- [List of talismans](/List_of_talismans "List of talismans")
- [Shapeshifter](/Shapeshifter "Shapeshifter")

## History

- The Shapeshifting skill was introduced in [0.31](/0.31 "0.31"). Previously, [Transmutations](/Transmutations "Transmutations") magic would let you change your form.

| [Magical](/Magic "Magic")                                             | [Spellcasting](/Spellcasting "Spellcasting") • [Invocations](/Invocations "Invocations") • [Evocations](/Evocations "Evocations") • [Shapeshifting]()                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |
| [Spell Schools](/List_of_spells_by_school "List of spells by school") | [Air](/Air "Air") • [Alchemy](/Alchemy "Alchemy") • [Conjurations](/Conjurations "Conjurations") • [Earth](/Earth "Earth") • [Fire](/Fire_Magic "Fire Magic") • [Hexes](/Hexes "Hexes") • [Ice](/Ice_Magic "Ice Magic") • [Necromancy](/Necromancy "Necromancy") • [Summoning](/Summoning "Summoning") • [Translocations](/Translocations "Translocations")                      |
html:
Shapeshifting

From CrawlWiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Version 0.31: This article may not be up to date for the latest stable release of Crawl.

The Shapeshifting skill governs use of talismans, items that change your form. Higher Shapeshifting will reduce HP penalties and increase form bonuses.

Contents

  • 1 Aptitudes
  • 2 Strategy
  • 3 See Also
  • 4 History

Aptitudes

At Ba Co DE Dg Ds Dj Dr Fe Fo Gr Gh Gn Hu Ko Mf Mi MD Mu Na Op On Sp Te Tr Vp VS
-2 0 -2 0 -2 -2 -2 -1 -2 0 -3 N/A 7 -1 -1 2 -3 -2 N/A -1 -1 -1 2 -2 -1 0 -1

Strategy

  • Most forms boost Unarmed Combat in some way.
  • The biggest jump is going from "not being in a form" to "being in a form". If you plan on going Shapeshifting, it can be wise to train Shapeshifting skill exclusively, until you reach an acceptable skill for a given form.
  • With the "average" species, Human, having -1 Shapeshifting, don't be afraid to train a negative Shapeshifting aptitude.

See Also

  • Talisman
  • List of talismans
  • Shapeshifter

History

  • The Shapeshifting skill was introduced in 0.31. Previously, Transmutations magic would let you change your form.
Skills

rawPage:
{{version031}}
The '''Shapeshifting''' skill governs use of [[talisman]]s, items that change your [[form]]. Higher Shapeshifting will reduce HP penalties and increase form bonuses.

{{skill aptitudes}}

==Strategy==
*Most forms boost [[Unarmed Combat]] in some way.
*The biggest jump is going from "not being in a form" to "being in a form". If you plan on going Shapeshifting, it can be wise to train Shapeshifting skill exclusively, until you reach an acceptable skill for a given form.
*With the "average" species, [[Human]], having -1 Shapeshifting, don't be afraid to train a negative Shapeshifting aptitude.

==See Also==
*[[Talisman]]
*[[List of talismans]]
*[[Shapeshifter]]

==History==
*The Shapeshifting skill was introduced in [[0.31]]. Previously, [[Transmutations]] magic would let you change your form.

{{Skills}}
